name: Regular Story
description:
To get out, one of you need to push the red button, but the one who will push it will DIE! Who will push the button? 

This is a story driven, point'n'click game, where you will need to decide what will happen with a characters surrounding you! 

Game is still in development, things that will be added - 

--More sound effects.

--There will be more stories about each character, to explore each of them more deeply.

--Grammar mistake fixes.
